name: Wolfgate Demo
detailed_description:
You have been reincarnated into a wolf creature! Finish passing through the Wolfgate in the this introduction to the game Wolfgate! Fight enemies, solve puzzles, collect power-ups to defeat the Demon standing in your way!
Are you ready to begin your adventure?
-Dodge and Attack Enemies
-Platforming
-Puzzles
-Boss Fights
-Secret Areas
-Demo Version
World Dragon Gaming LLC, we inspire imagination.

short_description: Can you get through the Wolfgate?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit Windows 7.
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU.
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card.
